mapper.select: select li_cd , stdr_ym , all_popltn_cnt , male_popltn_cnt , female_popltn_cnt from tgd_li_popltn_info

select c.code_nm , tlpi.li_cd , tlpi.stdr_ym , tlpi.all_popltn_cnt , tlpi.male_popltn_cnt , tlpi.female_popltn_cnt from ( select li_cd , stdr_ym , all_popltn_cnt , male_popltn_cnt , female_popltn_cnt from tgd_li_popltn_info where li_cd like #{liCd} || '%' and stdr_ym = #{stdrYm} ) tlpi inner join comtccmmndetailcode c on (c.code = tlpi.li_cd and c.code_id = 'YPLI')

select c2.code_nm , sum(tlpi.all_popltn_cnt) all_popltn_cnt , sum(tlpi.male_popltn_cnt) male_popltn_cnt , sum(tlpi.female_popltn_cnt) female_popltn_cnt from ( select li_cd , stdr_ym , all_popltn_cnt , male_popltn_cnt , female_popltn_cnt from tgd_li_popltn_info ) tlpi inner join comtccmmndetailcode c2 on (tlpi.li_cd like (substring(c2.code, 1, 8) || '%') and c2.code_id = 'YPE001') group by c2.code_nm

select c2.code_nm , c.code_nm li_nm , sum(tlpi.all_popltn_cnt) all_popltn_cnt , sum(tlpi.male_popltn_cnt) male_popltn_cnt , sum(tlpi.female_popltn_cnt) female_popltn_cnt , st_astext(geom) geom from ( select li_cd , stdr_ym , all_popltn_cnt , male_popltn_cnt , female_popltn_cnt , geom from tgd_li_popltn_info ) tlpi inner join comtccmmndetailcode c on (c.code = tlpi.li_cd and c.code_id = 'YPLI') inner join comtccmmndetailcode c2 on (tlpi.li_cd like (substring(c2.code, 1, 8) || '%') and c2.code_id = 'YPE001') group by c2.code_nm, c.code_nm , tlpi.geom
